channel.title: Help with limiting max stat
channel.description:
I made a runescape private server about 3 days ago and I have this one problem that I can't figure out. If someone reaches a stat skill of level 99, they crash and when they try to logg in it stays black and says "Loading-please wait...". Does anyone know how to limit the max skill to 98 or fix this problem. If you know can you please tell me where to go and what to find :].
I will appreciate it greatly.

item.title: Help with limiting max stat
item.dc:creator: @weeds weeds
item.description:
@weeds wrote:

its because the cleint you are using supposably “moparscape” cannpot support the models on the server such as skillcapes and therefore when you get a stat of 99 and get askillcape you will freeze

Read full topic

item.title: Help with limiting max stat
item.dc:creator: @mahfuz mahfuz
item.description:
@mahfuz wrote:

I think you need to go to SilabSoft client or another client to see it, because some active SkillCapes which most clients dont support.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with limiting max stat
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

server sided, unless…your on mopar client

Read full topic
